title: 6 Easy Steps to Redeem a Fortnite V-Bucks Gift Card

steps.title: Go to https://www.fortnite.com/vbuckscard in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.fortnite.com/vbuckscard in a web browser. Since there's no option to redeem Fortnite V-Bucks within the game, you must use the official Epic Games website. You can use a mobile or desktop browser. If you purchased V-Bucks directly, they should automatically be added to the account you used to purchase. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Get Started.
steps.content: Click Get Started . This is the yellow button in the center of the screen.

steps.title: Log into your Epic Games account.
steps.content: Log into your Epic Games account. If you don't have an Epic Games account, or you've been playing as a nameless account on console, you'll need to create one . Double-check your account name and make sure it's accurate. You won't be able to refund any redeemed cards.

steps.title: Enter the code (PIN) and click Next.
steps.content: Enter the code (PIN) and click Next . The code is on the back of the V-Bucks card. Use a coin to scratch off the security covering.

steps.title: Select the platform you play on and click Next.
steps.content: Select the platform you play on and click Next . You'll see a list of all devices linked to your Epic Games account. Make sure to select the proper platform. If you don't see your console, you'll need to link it first.

steps.title: Click Confirm.
steps.content: Click Confirm . If you play on PC, Nintendo Switch, or mobile, the funds will be added to your account. You can now purchase skins and other items from the Shop . If you play on Xbox or PlayStation, you'll receive a secondary code. Log into the Microsoft or PlayStation website with the account linked to your Epic Games account. Navigate to the Redeem Code (PlayStation) or Redeem (Xbox) section. Enter the secondary code.
